speaker: Secret Passage
lines: Books slide aside to reveal a narrow stair.
The air is still and cool.
You brush aside cobwebs near a peephole to the common room.
A small key hangs on a nail.
A stout door waits ahead with a lock.

give_item.name: Backroom Key
give_item.description: Opens the door that isn't a door

choices.text: Go back before the key changes its mind.
